activities: Conference, trade show, event, and exhibition services
personaldata: The Company may collect data that is lawful to collect under applicable laws, including, without limitation, an individual’s name, company name, mailing address, business address, email address, telephone number, payment card information and other payment information, date of birth, gender and other data requested by Company and provided by individuals and companies.
recoursemech: Viad Corp has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint from Viad Corp directly, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR website at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
